name: GRAV Retro
description:
GRAV is a simple, retro style gravitron game.


Destroy your enemies while avoiding enemy fire. One hit will destroy your craft so be careful! Steer your craft through the increasingly difficult levels!

Controls (Linux / Windows):

Arrow keys to turn and thrust, space to shoot. Escape and enter used in menus.

Controls (Android):

Use on-screen controls!

Also available on Google Play
